price: 6. Ya soló, na kati ya bokeseni ya butu mpe moyi mpe na manso maye Allah akela na likolo mpe na mabele, ezali bilembo тропа bato baye bazali kobanga.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ٱخۡتِلَٰفِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna fī ikh'tilāfi al-layli wal-nahāri wamā khalaqa al-lahu fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi laāyātin liqawmin yattaqūna
